Gift Cards Gift Cards Special Events Banquets Special Events Form × First Name * Last Name * Company Address * City * State * Postal Code * Mobile * Email * Event Type * Baby Showers Bridal Showers Holiday Parties Celebration of Life Corporate Meetings & Events Golden Celebrations Other Preferred Appointment Date * Approximate Guests * Comments Submit Weddings Create the wedding of your dreams in our stunning venue, where elegance meets breathtaking views. Whether you envision a romantic indoor celebration or a picturesque wedding, we provide the perfect backdrop for your special day. Let us help you create a magical wedding day filled with love, joy, and unforgettable memories. Plan Your Event Baby Showers Celebrate the upcoming arrival of your little one in a beautiful and welcoming setting. Our venue offers a charming atmosphere, perfect for gathering friends and family to share in this special moment. Let us help you create unforgettable memories as you celebrate this exciting milestone! Plan Your Event Bridal Showers Make your bridal shower or engagement party a memorable occasion in our stunning venue. With a warm and inviting atmosphere, it’s the perfect place to gather friends and family to celebrate love and new beginnings. Let us help you create a beautiful celebration filled with love, laughter, and cherished memories! Plan Your Event Holiday Parties Make your holiday party truly memorable in our festive and inviting venue. Whether it’s an intimate gathering or a grand celebration, we provide the perfect setting to spread cheer and enjoy the company of colleagues, friends, and family. Let us help you create a festive celebration filled with joy, laughter, and lasting memories. Plan Your Event Celebration of Life Create a heartfelt and meaningful Celebration of Life in our welcoming venue, where family and friends can come together to share memories, stories, and love for a cherished individual. We provide a warm atmosphere to honor their legacy in a beautiful setting. Let us help you create a meaningful tribute filled with love, remembrance, and connection. Plan Your Event Corporate Meetings & Events Host your next corporate meeting or event in our professional and versatile space designed to inspire collaboration and innovation. Our venue provides the perfect environment for productive discussions, presentations, and networking. Let us help you create a successful and memorable corporate event tailored to your needs. Plan Your Event Golden Celebrations We believe that every milestone deserves a memorable celebration. Whether it’s a birthday, anniversary, graduation, bar/bat mitzvah or any significant life event, our space is the perfect backdrop for your special moments. Let us take care of the details so you can focus on what truly matters—celebrating with your loved ones! Gift Cards Gift Cards About Bon Appétit Restaurant Experience the magic of Dunedin’s premier waterfront restaurant and bar The critically acclaimed Bon Appétit Restaurant has been bringing exquisite cuisine, top-notch service, and breathtaking views to Dunedin and Tampa Bay since opening on the coastline in 1976. Guests enjoy panoramic views of St. Joseph’s Sound and a stunning vista that includes Honeymoon Island, Caladesi Island, and Clearwater Beach. Featuring an award-winning menu with an emphasis on seafood and international cuisine, Chef Cirino Cruz and his team focus on highlighting simple, fresh ingredients. Throughout the busy season (January – May), the kitchen team premieres special menu features – a testament to their creative eye and signature style. A full lunch and dinner menu is always available for both our indoor dining room, as well as our outdoor bar and marina café. Reserve Your Table Eating outside at Bon Appétit is a quintessential component of the Dunedin experience. In addition to the welcome gulf breeze and abundance of adult beverages, you may even be joined by a pod of curious dolphins cruising the coast. Be sure to join us in the evening to take in the world-famous Dunedin sunset, either in this outdoor casual setting or our romantic main dining room. In addition to regular lunch and dinner service, Bon Appétit is renowned for its fabulous events, led by our on-site events team. Weddings on the pier, private birthday parties, and holiday celebrations are just the tip of the iceberg. Nancy and her banquet staff have hosted everything from baby showers to celebrations of life, and everything in between. Several times a year, the events team works with our kitchen and management teams to put on spectacular holiday dinners for our guests – these include Thanksgiving, Christmas Eve & Day, New Year’s Eve, Valentine’s Day, Mother’s Day, Easter, and Father’s Day. HOURS OF OPERATION: Lunch & Dinner MON-THURSDAY : 12:00PM – 9:00PM SATURDAY & SUNDAY : 11:00AM – 9:00PM Waterfront Dining Centrally located in Pinellas County, Bon Appétit is nestled along Dunedin’s picturesque coastline overlooking St. Joseph’s Sound. Breathtaking views come standard with every seat, whether dining indoors or outdoors. Due to the popularity of Dunedin’s famous coastal sunset, we strongly recommend reserving a table for dinner. FREE ON-SITE PARKING Bon Appétit Restaurant offers on-site parking at the paved parking lot directly east of the restaurant. Valet Parking available Friday and Saturday ARRIVAL BY BOAT If you’re arriving by boat to dine, you can use a day dock for free at the Dunedin Public Marina, adjacent to the restaurant. Find : more information here EXPLORE Enjoy a virtual walkthrough of our entire restaurant – bathrooms included! We are proud to maintain a top-notch operation and are happy to share a behind-the-scenes look at everything from the vegetable crisper to the wine cellar. Meet Our Team Christian Schrangl, General Manager Christian was born and raised in Austria, has over 25 years experience in the hospitality industry and is one of the Front House Managers at Bon Appétit. After he completed his studies in Restaurant and Hotel Management, Christian decided he wanted to see more of the world. He began his hospitality career aboard cruise ships, managing Restaurant and Hotel operations. In 2002, Christian married his wife Penny and decided to trade the high seas for a home base in Port Richey, FL. When he’s not at Bon Appétit ensuring guests have an enjoyable experience, he enjoys spending time outdoors, at the beach, or traveling overseas. Cirino Cruz Pantoja, Bon Appétit’s Chef Chef Cirino Cruz’s lifelong passion for the culinary arts has been driven by his desire to craft extraordinary dining experiences with each and every dish. His journey as a chef has been marked by pivotal experiences, including his time at Ponte’s Tuscan Grill under the guidance of Chef Chris Ponte and at Bon Appétit Restaurant with Chef Karl Riedl. Over 15 years, these establishments became his culinary home. This journey has shaped Chef Cruz’s unique culinary style, which places a strong emphasis on using the freshest local ingredients and maintaining an unwavering commitment to ensuring guest satisfaction through exceptional hospitality. Ellen Hale, Director of Public Relations Born and raised in central New Jersey, close to New York City, and close enough to the Jersey Shore for many memorable summers. Graduated from the University of Wisconsin in business administration and before embarking on a hospitality field career, worked in retail and bowling center management in Chicago. Currently, the Director of Public Relations for Big Claw Management venues under the Original Crabby Bills Family Brands ranging from Dunedin to St. Pete Beach. Before this, one of the front-of-the-house managers at Bon Appetit and concierge for the Bon Appetit Group properties. All of the above encompasses nearly eighteen years of service, adding enjoy my fellow co-workers as well. The years of working with the Tampa Bay community have not only resulted in business partnerships, but also friendships over the years to enjoy such enjoyments as the theater, sporting events, art galleries, concerts, and anything water-related. Traveled extensively throughout the United States, and into Europe, Canada, and Mexico. Always ready to hop on a plane anytime and anywhere! Throughout the busy season (January – May), the kitchen team premieres special menu features – a testament to their creative eye and signature style. A full lunch and dinner menu is always available for both our indoor dining room, as well as our outdoor bar and marina café. We are honored to have you at our table and are here to ensure you and your guests have a wonderful meal. Please let us know if we can do anything to make your experience here one to remember. Thank you and Bon Appetit !!
